description: End-to-end purchase management workflow to capture requisitions, approvals, vendor selection, purchase order issuance, goods receipt, invoice processing and payment. Includes master reference data and access control. Designed for auditability, SLA tracking and integration-ready imports.

sheets.name: ProcureFlow - Main Workflow

columns.name: Serial No
columns.description: Auto-increment serial number for easy reference.

columns.name: Procurement ID
columns.description: Primary key - unique procurement request identifier.

columns.name: Current Stage
columns.description: Current workflow stage (dropdown of workflow stages).

columns.name: Currency
columns.description: Currency for estimated/PO/invoice values (linked to Currency Master).

columns.name: Total Estimated Cost
columns.description: Estimated total value of the requisition (from Stage 1 summary).

columns.name: Delay1
columns.description: Delay (days) = Actual1 - Planned1 (negative or zero indicates on-time).

columns.name: Items Summary
columns.description: Concise description of requested items or services.

columns.name: Approver
columns.description: Approver name for requisition/PO approval (stage-specific uses same label where appropriate).

columns.name: Planned3
columns.description: Stage 3 planned completion date (Supplier Quotation & Selection).

columns.name: PO Currency
columns.description: Currency used in PO (linked to Currency Master).

columns.name: PO Terms Reference
columns.description: Reference to payment/delivery terms for PO (links to Payment Terms).

columns.name: PO Document URL
columns.description: Link to PO document in document store.

columns.name: Acceptance Percentage
columns.description: Percentage of items accepted after inspection.

columns.name: Invoice Matched To POGRN
columns.description: Reference to matched PO or GRN for three-way match.

columns.name: Discrepancy Flag
columns.description: Indicates whether invoice has discrepancies to resolve.

columns.name: Payment Currency
columns.description: Currency of the payment (links to Currency Master).

columns.name: Payment Date Actual Payment
columns.description: Date the payment was executed (duplicate for clarity with Actual9 if needed).

columns.name: ContractOrder Closed
columns.description: Indicates whether procurement record is formally closed.

columns.name: Closure Notes
columns.description: Final notes, reconciliation results and archival location.

columns.name: Total Delay Days
columns.description: Aggregated sum of all DelayN columns to measure total delay across lifecycle.

columns.name: Attachment Links
columns.description: General link(s) to supporting documents (contracts, approvals, attachments).

stages.stage_description: User creates a purchase requisition with required items, qty and estimated cost.
Approval routing and authorized approver signs off the requisition.
Request for quotes, evaluate supplier responses and select vendor.
Create Purchase Order (PO) with terms, items and send to vendor.
Internal approval of the created purchase order before dispatch.
Goods/services received from vendor, inspected and recorded (GRN).
Vendor invoice received and matched to PO/GRN.
Accounts verifies invoice, resolves discrepancies and approves for payment.
Payment is scheduled and executed according to terms (bank transfer, cheque, etc.).
Procurement record closure and archival, post-payment reconciliation and vendor performance capture.

sheets.description: Primary workflow sheet tracking each procurement request from creation to closure. All stages are columns in this sheet. Timestamp is the first column.

sheets.name: Login Master
sheets.description: User authentication and page access control.

sheets.name: Vendor Master
sheets.description: Master data for approved vendors and supplier details.

sheets.name: Item Master
sheets.description: Catalog of purchasable items/services with SKU, UoM and standard pricing.

sheets.name: Supplier Quotes
sheets.description: Imported or recorded vendor quotes for RFQ and comparative analysis.

sheets.name: Currency Master
sheets.description: List of supported currencies for transactions and reporting.

sheets.name: Department Master
sheets.description: Organizational departments used for request routing and cost center mapping.

sheets.name: Payment Terms
sheets.description: Standard payment terms used for POs (30 days, 60 days, advance, etc.).

sheets.name: Import Dump
sheets.description: Utility sheet for bulk import of requisitions, PO or invoice data before mapping into main workflow.
